sources.title: The Inugami Family (1976)
sources.description: The Inugami Family is a 1976 Japanese mystery film where the wealthy patriarch, Sahei Inugami, dies and leaves his fortune to an outsider, Tamayo, on the condition that she marries one of his grandsons. This leads to a series of murders within the family as they vie for the inheritance, revealing dark secrets and complex relationships. The film is directed by Kon Ichikawa and  is based on the novel The Inugami Curse by Seishi Yokomizo.

metadata.Plot: When a tycoon passes away, he unexpectedly leaves the family fortune to outsider Tamayo on the condition that she marries one of the grandsons, pitting blood against blood.
metadata.Writer: Norio Osada, Shin'ya Hidaka, Kon Ichikawa
metadata.Actors: Kôji Ishizaka, Yôko Shimada, Teruhiko Aoi
